flawed_nl_solution:
The total number of scoops of ice cream that Mary has is 3 cartons * 10 scoops = <<3*10=30>>30 scoops of ice cream.
Lucas, Danny and Connor will eat 2 scoops * 3 people = <<2*3=6>>6 scoops of ice cream.
Shannon will eat 2 * (1 vanilla + 1 strawberry) = <<2*(1+1)=4>>4 total scoops of ice cream.
Combined the kids will eat a total of 1 + 6 + 1 + 4 scoops = <<1+6+1+4=12>>12 scoops of ice cream.
Mary will have 30 scoops - 12 scoops = <<30-12=19>>19 scoops of ice cream remaining.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 18, not 19. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
